name: Honey Breaker
description:
Honey Breaker

is a breakout-style game with a twist. The blocks are now hexagons and the inhabitants are angry at you!!
The game features:

  • Multiple levels
  • 3 types of breakable blocks with damage levels
  • Sound and particle effects
  • Score system

You can also download the assets to try and recreate the game :)

Enjoy!
